## Data Processing
Writing a function to input an API Url and then import it into our workspace.
```{r}
library(httr)

URL_id <- "api.census.gov/data/2022/acs/acs1/pums?get=SEX,PWGTP,MAR&SCHL=24&key=YOUR_KEY_GOES_HERE"

id <- GET(URL_id)
str(id)
```
